---
title: Kaggle Talking Data用户行为分析
date: 2016-07-21 00:00:00 Z
layout: post
---

{{page.title}}
===========
<p class="meta">July 21 2016</p>

首先看任选一个用户，查看其行为轨迹

